title: CarLoan FAQs and Honda Alliance'
author: HBL Content
summary: HBL CarLoan is available to salaried individuals and self-employed professionals with a stable, verifiable income. Existing HBL customers may receive certain benefits, and two applicants can jointly apply as co-borrowers, with both incomes considered. Monthly installments are deposited into a non-checking repayment account, and the service is available across multiple cities, including Karachi, Lahore, Islamabad, and more. HBL offers various conveniences such as no minimum balance in the repayment account, the ability to finance Withholding Tax (WHT), and early loan settlement, though certain charges apply. Processing fees are Rs. 7,500 + FED, with a 50% discount for repeat customers. Partial payments are allowed, and the prepayment penalty can be waived if the customer takes another loan within 30 days of settling the current one.
